title: Kouki Arai
text: is a <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="Rugby%20Union">rugby union</a> player who plays as a <a href="Scrum-half%20%28rugby%20union%29">scrum-half</a>. He currently plays for the <a href="Canon%20Eagles">Canon Eagles</a> in Japan's domestic <a href="Top%20League">Top League</a>.
